queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_full_page_cache_files` ( `file_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` mediumint(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `category_id` mediumint(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `controller` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `path` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `file_hash` char(12) NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `request_uri` char(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`), UNIQUE KEY `file_hash` (`file_hash`), KEY `timestamp` (`timestamp`), KEY `controller` (`controller`), KEY `request_uri` (`request_uri`), KEY `company_id` (`company_id`), KEY `category_id` (`category_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
